value.title: Automatically assigned tag that describes device and interface on the other side of the link
Interface description downloaded from the device

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "ifInRate" WHERE "deviceName" = '$deviceName' AND "component" = '$component' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName", "component" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ifOutRate" WHERE "deviceName" = '$deviceName' AND "component" = '$component' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName", "component" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ifInErrorRate" WHERE "deviceName" = '$deviceName' AND "component" = '$component' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName", "component" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ifOutErrorRate" WHERE "deviceName" = '$deviceName' AND "component" = '$component' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName", "component" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ifInDiscardRate" WHERE "deviceName" = '$deviceName' AND "component" = '$component' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName", "component" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "ifOutDiscardRate" WHERE "deviceName" = '$deviceName' AND "component" = '$component' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "deviceName", "component" fill(null)

list.name: device
list.query: SELECT name FROM devices WHERE Role != NetSpyGlassServer AND Role != SimulatedNode AND Role != SimulatedBridge ORDER BY name

list.name: interface
list.query: SELECT component FROM ifOperStatus WHERE device="$device" ORDER BY component
